statements: DELETE FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_name = 'Jacket' AND item_color = 'Black';

DELETE FROM clothing_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Shirt' AND item_color = 'Blue';

DELETE FROM Product_Listings WHERE price > 1000 OR availability = FALSE;
